languages.text: "Господин Каллигос, кажется, утратил здравость рассудка, раз принимает Лорд-капитана за врагов Человечества..." {n}Абеляр с тревожным видом кладет руку на оружие.{/n}
"Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Господин Каллигос, кажется, утратил здравость рассудка, раз принимает Лорд-капитана за врагов Человечества..." {n}Абеляр с тревожным видом кладет руку на оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “卡里戈斯大人肯定是疯了，不然怎么可能会把舰长大人错认成人类之敌地？”{n}阿贝拉德一脸担忧，将手搭在武器上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “卡里戈斯大人肯定是疯了，不然怎么可能会把舰长大人错认成人类之敌地？”{n}阿贝拉德一脸担忧，将手搭在武器上。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Calligos muss den Verstand verloren haben. Warum sonst sollte er den Lord Captain für einen Feind der Menschheit halten?" {n}Abelard legt unruhig eine Hand auf seine Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Calligos muss den Verstand verloren haben. Warum sonst sollte er den Lord Captain für einen Feind der Menschheit halten?" {n}Abelard legt unruhig eine Hand auf seine Waffe{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Calligos debe de haber perdido la razón. ¿Por qué si no iba a confundir {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán con un enemigo de la Humanidad?». {n}Abelard coloca una mano sobre su arma con gesto aprensivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Calligos debe de haber perdido la razón. ¿Por qué si no iba a confundir {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán con los enemigos de la Humanidad?». {n}Abelard coloca una mano sobre su arma con gesto aprensivo.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Le seigneur Calligos a dû perdre la raison. Pourquoi prendrait-il {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pour {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} de l'humanité ? » {n}demande Abélard en posant la main sur son arme avec appréhension.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur Calligos a dû perdre la raison. Pourquoi prendrait-il {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pour {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} de l'humanité ? » {n}demande Abélard en posant la main sur son arme avec appréhension.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「カリゴス卿は正気を失ったに違いない。そうでなければ、なぜロード・キャプテンを人類の敵だと勘違いするのでしょう？」{n}アベラルドは心配そうに武器に手をかける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス卿は正気を失ったに違いない。そうでなければ、なぜロード・キャプテンを人類の敵だと勘違いするのでしょう？」{n}アベラルドは心配そうに武器に手をかける。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Calligos, aklını yitirmiş olmalı. Yoksa neden Lord Kaptan'ı İnsanlığın düşmanı sansın?" {n}Abelard, kaygılı bir şekilde elini silahına götürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Calligos must have lost his mind. Why else would he mistake the Lord Captain for an enemy of Humanity?" {n}Abelard lays a hand on his weapon apprehensively.{/n}
